name: Star Balls
description: Star Balls is an awesome puzzler game that follows three stowaways on a spaceship trying to use their unique skills to navigate the craft and escape. The 3D visuals are incredibly rich, the story is good, there are plenty of levels, power-ups and itâ€™s a must play game.

reviews.review_text: This game was a lot of fun with an epic story line. I personally think that the level design was great along with the characters between Orbit, T.O.R.K., and Tess. After my second playthrough it is still fun!
